name: Rude Bear Revengeance
description:
A game created in one weekend for Ludum Dare 29. The theme was "Beneath The Surface" by:
Alex Rose - Code, Design, GFX, SFX, Webpage.
Daniel Burrows - Graphics
Rekkitt - Lift/Title/Desert Themes
Anchore State - Underground Music

Rude Bear conceived by:
Alex Rose and Antony Dewar

Rude Bear Revengeance is the heartwarming tale of an ursine cyborg resurrected to hunt down his normal nemesis with an armada of supercharged cyberpunk techniques.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Jump with space (jump infinitely after getting the powerup).
  • Wallrun by walking into a wall after getting the powerup.
  • Aim the whip with the mouse after obtaining it.
  • Fire and recoil the whip with left click.
  • Reel yourself towards the whip with right click.
  • Dive kick with E.
